unnormalised: The estimated expenditure for a 7-day trip to Kerala is approx. ₹35000 per person, excluding flight tickets which can cost around ₹15000-₹25000 depending on the season. Please note that prices of houseboats could range between INR 8000 to INR 20000 per night.
normalised: The estimated expenditure for a seven day trip to Kerala is approximately rupee thirty five thousand per person, excluding flight tickets which can cost around rupee fifteen thousand to rupee twenty five thousand depending on the season. Please note that prices of houseboats could range between Indian Rupee eight thousand to Indian Rupee twenty thousand per night.
